AD_Mourning.synopsis: The gnome mourns his dead sister via AD.
AD_Mourning.how_to_trigger: Finish Mutiny in Ketheric City with the gnome alive.

AD_Mourning_0.speaker: Welso
AD_Mourning_0.text: Damned drow. He did this to you...
AD_Mourning_0.context: NodeContext: Mourning his fallen sister. Sad as can be.
